title: The Strand

renewed-contributions.title: Sergeant Sir Peter's Cases, No. 2: The Desk-Breaker
renewed-contributions.note: CCE renewal records for stories in the January 1930 issue give inconsistent copyright dates, some in 1929 and some in 1930. We list renewals for this issue here to be on the safe side, though US copyrights for material in this issue may have expired as of 2025.

renewed-contributions.title: Sergeant Sir Peter's Cases, No. 3: The Inheritor
The Death Scratch
renewed-contributions.note: The CCE renewal record gives a copyright date for the second installment, from the January issue, as December 31, 1929.  Copyrights of that date are now expired in the US.

renewed-contributions.title: Sergeant Sir Peter's Cases, No. 4: Dr. Fifer's Patient
Sergeant Sir Peter's Cases, No. 6: Buried Treasure
The Death Scratch
renewed-contributions.note: The CCE renewal record lists this as the last installment. FictionMags also lists a seventh and last installment in the June issue. We have not examined that issue ourselves.

renewed-contributions.title: The Creaking Door
renewed-contributions.note: Title as given in CCE renewal record. FictionMags gives title as 'The Creeping Door'. We have not examined the issue in question.

comment: We have NOT put in all renewals filed in 1958, but the only ones we haven't put in are from 1931.
additional-note: This is a British publication.  Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US.
